name: Workplace Metrics
description: Calculate various workplace metrics from a layout.

Calculation Mode.description:
“Headcount” is a sum of the headcount of each space.
“Fixed sharing ratio” will multiply a ratio value by the sum of the number of desks in the spaces.
“Fixed headcount” will allow you to manually type in a number to use as your overall headcount and ignore headcount on individual spaces.

Total Headcount.description: How many people will occupy this workspace?

Desk Sharing Ratio.description: What is the assumed sharing ratio: How many people for every desk? A value of 1 means one desk for every person; A value of 2 means there's only one desk for every two people.

USF Exclusions.description: Exclude regions from floor area calculations such as elevator shafts and stairwells.

items.description: A boundary around an area to be excluded from USF Calculation. This area will be excluded from each floor.

Rentable Area.description: Adjust the Rentable Area for calculations + display.  Note: unless you update this manually, it is computed using a fixed ratio of 1.2 * Usable Area.

Usable Area.description: Adjust the Usable Area for calculations + display.

outputs.name: Floor Area
outputs.description: The total floor area of the project.

outputs.name: Area per Headcount
outputs.description: The usable floor area per person.

outputs.name: Meeting room seats
outputs.description: The total number of seats in the meeting rooms.

outputs.name: Classroom seats
outputs.description: The total number of classroom seats.

outputs.name: Collaboration seats
outputs.description: Total seats in open collaboration areas.

outputs.name: Total Headcount
outputs.description: The total number of employees and visitors accommodated.

outputs.name: Area per Desk
outputs.description: The usable floor area per desk.

outputs.name: Desk Sharing Ratio
outputs.description: How many people are there for each desk?

outputs.name: Meeting room ratio
outputs.description: On average how many people does each meeting room serve? A value of 30 means there's one meeting room for every 30 people.

outputs.name: Circulation / USF Ratio
outputs.description: The ratio of circulation area to usable floor area.

outputs.name: Circulation / RSF Ratio
outputs.description: The ratio of circulation area to rentable floor area.
